rawMarkdown:
# Projects from GitHub

A collection of open-source tools, experiments, and learning projects.

## Featured Projects

### fddl - Fast Document Deployment Layer

A static site generator written in Swift, featuring a custom markdown processor (SwiftMark), flexible shortcode system, and plugin architecture.

**Technologies**: Swift, SwiftNIO, Markdown  
**Status**: Active Development
[Learn More](/projects/fddl.html)
[View Project](https://github.com/aviatorcards/fddl)
[Documentation](/docs/index.html)

---

### SwiftMark

High-performance markdown processor built with a recursive descent parser. Designed for speed and extensibility, SwiftMark powers the fddl static site generator.

**Technologies**: Swift  
**Status**: Integrated within fddl  
[Learn More](/projects/swiftmark.html)
[View Project](https://github.com/aviatorcards/swiftmark)

---

### Atmosphere

Swift-based journaling app built to explore SwiftUI. UI inspired by [Journal](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/journal/id6447391597).

**Technologies**: Swift, SwiftUI, Core Data
**Status**: Active Development
[Learn More](/projects/atmosphere.html)
[View Project](https://github.com/aviatorcards/atmosphere)

---

### Rookery

Swift-based web application for managing code snippets with rich metadata, built using the Vapor web framework.

**Technologies**: Swift, Vapor, PostgreSQL  
**Status**: Active Development
[Learn More](/projects/rookery.html)
[View Project](https://github.com/aviatorcards/rookery)

---

fddl - Fast Document Deployment Layer
